title: BigSteppa
author: BigSteppa
content: Hi, I am BigSteppa and I run the Big Steppa marketing firm.We offer may services regarding cryptocurrency marketing and promotions.For this job, you will need to find customers for me!You will need to contact them by any means you may choose, and you will then receive a cut of the total amount of the deal.If you are interested, contact me via PM on here, or via telegram @ t.me/vision6636I will give you all the resources needed to find clients.

comments.author: Khanvila78
comments.body: Quote from: BigSteppa on June 10, 2022, 01:38:16 AMHi, I am BigSteppa and I run the Big Steppa marketing firm.We offer may services regarding cryptocurrency marketing and promotions.For this job, you will need to find customers for me!You will need to contact them by any means you may choose, and you will then receive a cut of the total amount of the deal.If you are interested, contact me via PM on here, or via telegram @ t.me/vision6636I will give you all the resources needed to find clients.I want to work with you.But what kind of work do you do?Contact: https://t.me/blueking7

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: What kind of marketing promotions your service do? Or maybe you can provide your website url to see the services provided by the site coz google have lots results when searching about the keyword "bigsteppa".And what's the assurance of the one who get a client for you to be able to get paid?These are just some questions asked since that amount is too good to be true if compared what you get from doing service here.
